entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
